desc: Boilermaker Tailgate Chili Recipe and Video - Ground beef, Italian sausage, beans, and a tomato base come together with lots of flavor and spice in this popular chili recipe. It's perfect for tailgating before football games or any time of year.
Flatlander Chili Recipe and Video - This is a good red bean and ground beef chili with lots of chili powder and plenty of herbs!

The Best Vegetarian Chili in the World Recipe and Video - Break out your soup pot and fix up a batch of this delicious, spicy vegetarian chili today! It's ready in no time, and packed with vegetables, beans - and flavor!

It's Chili by George!! Recipe and Video - This is a good, standard chili, with lots of ground beef, tomatoes, kidney and pinto beans, and onions.  It needs to simmer for 90 minutes on the stove, or can be made in a slow cooker and left to simmer all day.
Easy Chili I Recipe and Video - This is a powerhouse chili that's a snap to make!  Just saute onion, beef, and green bell peppers, and then stir in spices, chile peppers and tomatoes!

Just Like Wendy's(R) Chili Recipe and Video - Chili that tastes like the kind from that famous chain with the juicy, square burgers is easy to make and only needs an hour to simmer. Serve it with finely chopped onion and shredded cheese.
Creamy White Chili Recipe and Video - Chicken breasts and Great Northern beans are simmered with green chiles and served with sour cream for a creamy white chili perfect for a cold night.

Debdoozie's Blue Ribbon Chili Recipe and Video - Prepared salsa and chili seasoning mix speed preparation of this easy version of chili. Serve over cornbread or with crackers. Add jalapeno peppers for more heat.

Frank's Spicy Alabama Onion Beer Chili Recipe and Video - Spicy beef, onion, and beer chili recipe I picked up while in Alabama. Many people have asked me for the recipe so I'm posting it here. Enjoy! Adjust the amount of jalapenos and other spicy things to suit your taste.
Beef, Bean, and Beer Chili Recipe and Video - Chef John uses beer and lots of herbs and spices in his hearty Beef, Bean, and Beer Chili--perfect for a picnic or a potluck.
Smokin' Scovilles Turkey Chili Recipe and Video - This is a hearty and relatively low-fat chili recipe that is guaranteed to satisfy even the most sadistic spicy food lover...REAL MAN FOOD.
Terrific Turkey Chili Recipe and Video - This quick turkey chili recipe using zucchini, green onion, sour cream, and cheddar cheese will please even the pickiest eater.
Washabinaros Chili Recipe - This thick chili with sausage, ground beef, tomatoes, coffee and beer is also spiced with wasabi!

Chili I Recipe and Video - Here's a chili recipe you'll love, combining ground beef and cubed top sirloin. Other ingredients include beer, strong-brewed coffee, unsweetened cocoa powder and ground cumin.
Jeff's Hot Dog Chili Recipe and Video - A simple but flavorful chili designed for serving on a hot dog and bun has just a few ingredients (and no beans). It's ready in about half an hour.
Best Damn Chili Recipe and Video - With an assortment of sweet and hot peppers, this slow simmered beef and kidney bean chili is a hearty treat your family will love.
Paleo Chili Recipe - Even non-paleo diners will enjoy this deep, smoky, flavorful chili packed with meat, vegetables, and spices.

White Bean Chicken Chili Recipe and Video - Canned white beans and cooked chicken meat are mixed in chicken stock with tomatillos, green chilies, chopped tomatoes, and fresh corn kernels in this lightly seasoned chili.

My Chili Recipe and Video - If you want a good, basic chili recipe, this is it.  No odd vegetables, or secret ingredients, just ground beef, tomatoes, red kidney beans, and the usual spices.  Simple and delicious.
Quick Chili I Recipe and Video - Easy chili with beans can be made as mild or spicy as desired. It's even better the next day.
